long_description:
# GC Gamemode

Easily switch between the survival and creative inventory

## Known issues

- You have to click any tab in the inventory after changing your gamemode (e.g. `crafting`)
name: gc_gamemode
short_description: Easily switch between the survival and creative inventory
title: GC Gamemode
